outputs.output_descr:
The strategy for agricultural development in Qatar includes the production of high value products as water and arable land are scarce resources. Presently, the Ministry of Environment and private sector date growers are convinced of the date production potential and are striving to establish commercial date plantations to promote a viable date production industry.
The immediate beneficiaries for the short and medium terms will be Qatari small scale farmers who will see their production increased. A significant increase in incomes of date farmers will be obtained. Other beneficiaries are large scale date growers and the private commercial sector processing, packing, and retailing date products. Mainly the activities revolve around shipments of Dates imported to the Qatari ministry of environment from UAE.

project_title: Sustainable Date Palm Improvement & Rehabilitation Progr
